name: Glitch Maze.exe
description:
Glitch Maze.exe is a casual maze game, that draws inspiration from games like Pac-Man, while adding subtle horror elements.
The game embraces the concept of using your past failures to progress: every time you die, you leave behind a small beacon of light that reveals parts of the maze and dangers lurking in it.

Features



  • Explore 18 handcrafted mazes


  • Use your past failures to beat the maze or play cautiously


  • Use power-ups to highlight or freeze the dangers


  • Gather high scores to alter the dynamic on the level


  • Find sercrets
